Package Steganography.Logic

Class GifSequenceWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Steganography.Logic.GifSequenceWriter

  • class GifSequenceWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    The GifSequenceWriter class is used by GifSteganography class to create a GIF89a image based on an array of BufferedImage and an array of IIOMetadata.
    Author:
    Elliot Kroo (2009-04-25)., Feres Gaaloul (2018-07).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private javax.imageio.ImageWriter gifWriter
      Used to write a gif image.
      private javax.imageio.ImageWriteParam imageWriteParam
      Describes how the gif will be written.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates a new GifSequenceWriter

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Close this GifSequenceWriter object.

      Returns the first available GIF ImageWriter using ImageIO.getImageWritersBySuffix("gif").

    • Constructor Detail

      • GifSequenceWriter

        public GifSequenceWriter​(javax.imageio.stream.ImageOutputStream outputStream,
                         javax.imageio.ImageTypeSpecifier imageTypeSpecifier,
                         int timeBetweenFramesMS,
                         boolean loopContinuously)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new GifSequenceWriter
        Parameters:
        outputStream - the ImageOutputStream to be written to
        imageTypeSpecifier - the ImageTypeSpecifier of the image
        timeBetweenFramesMS - the time between frames in milliseconds
        loopContinuously - whether the gif should loop repeatedly
        Throws:
        javax.imageio.IIOException - if no gif ImageWriters are found.
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • getWriter

        private static javax.imageio.ImageWriter getWriter​()
                                            throws javax.imageio.IIOException
        Returns the first available GIF ImageWriter using ImageIO.getImageWritersBySuffix("gif").
        Returns:
        a GIF ImageWriter object.
        Throws:
        javax.imageio.IIOException - if no GIF image writers are returned.

      • writeToSequence

        public void writeToSequence​(java.awt.image.RenderedImage img,
                            javax.imageio.metadata.IIOMetadata originalImageMetaData)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Adds a frame to the gif sequence.
        Parameters:
        img - frame to add to the sequence
        originalImageMetaData - metadata of the frame to add
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while writing a frame to the sequence.

      • close

        public void close​()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Close this GifSequenceWriter object. This does not close the underlying stream, just finishes off the GIF.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while closing the gif sequence.
